Name: Ambrosio Cup
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with soda water.
Review: Cachaça, Bison Grass vodka and manzanilla sherry combine harmoniously and are freshened with mint and lime in this refreshing cocktail.
History: Created in 2013 by Ann Robinson at PDT, New York City, USA
